spells.name: See Darkness
spells.description: Blinds the target, disallowing them from using sight to direct spells and attacks.

spells.name: Burn
spells.description: Summons a swirling ray of blazing flame.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: Channel the heat from your opponent, inflicting rapid frostbite.

spells.name: Have Terror
spells.description: Fills the target's minds with horrifying images of their darkest nightmares.

spells.name: Damage
spells.description: Rends the target's tissue structure, inflicting damage and internal hemorrhaging.
